entry.title: Combined summary - Forking personal "vanity" versions...
entry.summary: In a forum discussion from 2011, Alan Grimes made a brief comment in response to those who believed there were too many vanity versions of Bitcoin. Another participant criticized Grimes' lack of substance and usefulness in the post, expressing frustration with such one-off emails. However, Grimes's comment raises the question of whether there is a vanity version of Bitcoin that removes the use of libdb or requires its development headers to be uninstalled.
